app.home_page.home_funcs.behind_button_pushed(self)[source]

State dependent actions.

If the environment exists a runner is activated to launch the behind the meter app in it’s installed environment. If the environment doesn’t exist, a runner is activated to install the environment that launches the behind the meter app.

app.home_page.home_funcs.btm_fin(self)[source]

Update the behind the meter action button to launch after the runner is complete.

app.home_page.home_funcs.btm_settings(self)[source]

Activate a runner to remove the environment that launches the behind the meter app.

app.home_page.home_funcs.btm_uninstall_fin(self)[source]

Update the state of the behind the meter action button to be reinstallable.

behind_button_pushed()

State dependent actions.

If the environment exists a runner is activated to launch the behind the meter app in it’s installed environment. If the environment doesn’t exist, a runner is activated to install the environment that launches the behind the meter app.
